helpText: 須_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________鷗.

generic.title: 須_Error updating categories__________________________鷗
generic.message: 須_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________鷗.

maxDepthExceeded.title: 須_Error updating categories__________________________鷗
maxDepthExceeded.message: 須_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________鷗.

destinationHasSameName.title: 須_Error updating categories__________________________鷗
destinationHasSameName.message: 須_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________鷗.

emptyTitle.message: 須_Category title cannot be empty_________________鷗.

noSchema.title: 須_Schema not found_________________鷗
noSchema.message: 須_Item schema not found for user_________________鷗.

maxCharacter.title: 須_Error updating categories__________________________鷗
maxCharacter.message: 須_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________鷗.

deleteInUseCategory.title: 須_Delete category________________鷗
deleteInUseCategory.message: 須_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________鷗.

custom.title: 須_Custom categories__________________鷗
custom.message: 須_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________鷗.

arcgis.title: 須_ArcGIS categories__________________鷗
arcgis.message: 須_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________鷗.

iso.title: 須_ISO categories_______________鷗
iso.message: 須_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________鷗.

inspire.title: 須_INSPIRE categories___________________鷗
inspire.message: 須_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________鷗.
